newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austria swamped by heavy rain, traffic chaotic.
newsitem.headline: Austria swamped by heavy rain, traffic chaotic.

text.p: Heavy rain for the last four days has wreaked havoc throughout Austria, triggering floods and mudslides and crippling road and rail traffic, Austrian state television said on Tuesday.
The situation was most serious in the east of the Alpine republic around Vienna where hundreds of people in the flood plains needed to be evacuated.
Some areas, with water levels already touching the roofs of houses, were completely cut off.
One person has drowned and another is missing, television said.
